HomePage.heroTitle: Find Your Life Partner - The Islamic Way
HomePage.heroSubtitle: A FREE platform for the Muslim community of Madhubani. With a focus on privacy and Islamic values.
HomePage.nearbyProfilesSubtitle: Get a glimpse of profiles from your area.

AppTour.step1_content: Welcome to Madhubani Nikah! Let's take a quick tour of the platform.
AppTour.step2_content: Click here to create your free profile and start your search for a life partner.
AppTour.step3_content: Or, you can start by browsing profiles from our community right away.
AppTour.step4_content: Get a glimpse of profiles from your local area right here on the homepage.
AppTour.step5_content: You can switch the language between English, Hindi, and Urdu to use the site comfortably.
